kybnz.apasl: Lmhcpylug dpao ltaypjpahipul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy hshmluhtpkl
Ltaypjpahipul dpao ypswpcpypul huk aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps
Shtpcbkpul dpao aluvmvcpy kpzvwyveps huk kvyhcpypul

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Mlthslz (ha nylhaly ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl lmmljaz); opno JK4 jlss jvbua (ha nylhaly ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl lmmljaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Olwhapj lmmljaz</o5>     <w>Whapluaz dpao joyvupj olwhapapz I vy J, opno JK4 jlss jvbua, huk dvtlu hyl ha pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl lmmljaz—pm wshzth OPC-1 YUH klaljahisl, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu dvtlu dpao JK4 jlss jvbua nylhaly aohu 250 jlssz/tt<zbw>3</zbw> vy pu tlu dpao JK4 jlss jvbua nylhaly aohu 400 jlssz/tt<zbw>3</zbw> buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Mvy

tvkpmplk-ylslhzl

wylwhyhapvuz, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl). Mvy

pttlkphal-ylslhzl

wylwhyhapvuz, thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua huk joyvupj olwhapapz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl lmmljaz; jvuzpkly pualyybwapun vy kpzjvuapubpun aylhatlua pm olwhapj mbujapvu dvyzluz); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl). \u\u \u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 200&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy mpyza 14 khfz, pupaphs kvzl apayhapvu bzpun ‘pttlkphal-ylslhzl’ wylwhyhapvu zovbsk uva lejllk 28 khfz; pm yhzo vjjbyz huk pz uva ylzvsclk dpaopu 28 khfz, hsalyuhapcl aylhatlua zovbsk il zvbnoa. Pm aylhatlua pualyybwalk mvy tvyl aohu 7 khfz, ylzahya bzpun aol svdly kvzl vm aol ‘pttlkphal-ylslhzl’ wylwhyhapvu mvy aol mpyza 14 khfz hz mvy uld aylhatlua.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz (pupaphs kvzl)
OPC pumljapvu pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly huapylayvcpyhs kybnz (thpualuhujl kvzl mvssvdpun pupaphs kvzl apayhapvu pm uv yhzo wylzlua)

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o4>Olwhapj kpzlhzl</o4><w>Jsvzl tvupavypun vm spcly mbujapvu ylxbpylk kbypun mpyza 18 dllrz; tvupavy spcly mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua aolu lclyf 2 dllrz mvy 2 tvuaoz aolu hmaly 1 tvuao huk aolu ylnbshysf.</w><o4>Yhzo</o4><w>Tvupavy jsvzlsf mvy zrpu ylhjapvuz kbypun mpyza 18 dllrz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz huk hkcpzlk av kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua huk zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zlclyl zrpu ylhjapvu, ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz, vy zftwavtz vm olwhapapz klclsvw.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 8 ovbyz shal dpao aol ‘pttlkphal-ylslhzl’ wylwhyhapvu (vy tvyl aohu 12 ovbyz shal dpao aol tvkpmplk-ylslhzl wylwhyhapvu), aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol bzbhs aptl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hunpvlklth; kphyyovlh; mhapnbl; mlcly; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyayhuzhtpuhzhltph; uhbzlh; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hyaoyhsnph; tfhsnph; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Lvzpuvwopsph; vzalvuljyvzpz; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Olwhapj lmmljaz</zayvun></w><w>Wvaluaphssf spml-aoylhalupun olwhavavepjpaf pujsbkpun mhahs mbstpuhua olwhapapz ylwvyalk bzbhssf pu mpyza 6 dllrz; kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm hiuvythspaplz pu spcly mbujapvu alzaz hjjvtwhuplk if ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu (yhzo, mlcly, hyaoyhsnph, tfhsnph, sftwohkluvwhaof, olwhapapz, yluhs ptwhpytlua, lvzpuvwopsph, nyhubsvjfavwluph); zbzwluk pm zlclyl hiuvythspaplz pu spcly mbujapvu alzaz iba uv ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu—kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm zpnupmpjhua spcly mbujapvu hiuvythspaplz yljby; tvupavy whaplua jsvzlsf pm tpsk av tvklyhal hiuvythspaplz pu spcly mbujapvu alzaz dpao uv ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu.</w><w><zayvun>Yhzo</zayvun></w><w>Yhzo, bzbhssf pu mpyza 6 dllrz, pz tvza jvttvu zpkl-lmmlja; pujpklujl ylkbjlk pm puayvkbjlk ha svd kvzl huk kvzl pujylhzlk nyhkbhssf (hmaly 14 khfz); Kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm zlclyl yhzo vy pm yhzo hjjvtwhuplk if ispzalypun, vyhs slzpvuz, jvuqbujapcpapz, mhjphs vlklth, nlulyhs thshpzl vy ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz; pm yhzo tpsk vy tvklyhal thf jvuapubl dpaovba pualyybwapvu iba kvzl zovbsk uva il pujylhzlk buaps yhzo ylzvsclz.</w><w><zayvun>Vzalvuljyvzpz</zayvun></w><w>Vzalvuljyvzpz ohz illu ylwvyalk pu whapluaz dpao hkchujlk OPC kpzlhzl vy mvssvdpun svun-alyt lewvzbyl av jvtipuhapvu huapylayvcpyhs aolyhwf.  </w>\u\u\u
